entry.title: Ω Sweet Ω: The Life and Work of Georg Ohm, the Man Behind the Symbol

link.title: Ω Sweet Ω: The Life and Work of Georg Ohm, the Man Behind the Symbol

entry.summary: Georg Ohm, the man behind the most well-known electrical equation, had a surprisingly hard time convincing others of its importance at the time.
